page.title: 14Moving into Much Marcle
page.content: Before I moved to Much Marcle I lived in New Ash Green which was about the same size as the town of Ledbury.It was quite big with approximately thirty shops.At New Ash Green we had a house with three bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, lounge, diningroom and small garden.We moved to Much Marcle to have more land,to keep the ponies and because my grandfather lives in Cheltenham.The house we live in ,at Much Marcle is in a mess ,but we are slowly improving it.we have almost finished upstairs,and now we are improving the landing. I like Much Marcle much better than New Ash Green.There is so much to look out for,I see rabbits running across the road,birds in the trees,different crops in the fields.I like being in a small school because we get much more work done.
